name: Retool
description: Retool is a 3D hacking puzzle game where you try to escape incomplete orbital stations by hacking into computers to rewire outputs of electronics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.6GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Full controller support
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Full controller support
